about_the_game:
A value set of Mana materials that will come in handy in the first half of the story.

Red Droplet x30
Blue Droplet x30
Yellow Droplet x30
Dark Droplet x30
Rainbow Droplet x15

*Can also be obtained in-game.
*Open [DLC] under [Items] in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*Please note that all items in excess of the maximum amount will be lost.
